revised_title: Radiation and Scattering of Surface Waves by a Vertical Circular Cylinder in a Channel
tldr: This article presents a study on the radiation and scattering of surface waves by a vertical circular cylinder in a channel. The authors develop a fundamentally different method using channel multipoles to predict the far-field behavior and solve various problems involving circular cylinders in channels. They consider radiation and scattering problems, including cylinders occupying the whole depth of fluid and those with truncated cylinders.
